tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE referee_data (
  referee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  experience_years INT
)

CREATE TABLE disciplinary_decisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_description VARCHAR(255),
    match_id INT,
    referee_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (match_id) REFERENCES match_rules(rule_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (referee_id) REFERENCES referee_data(referee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Referees (
  referee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  years_of_experience INT
)

CREATE TABLE Matches (
  match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  match_date DATE,
  venue VARCHAR(100),
  referee_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (referee_id) REFERENCES Referees(referee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MatchRules (
  rule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  rule_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DisciplinaryDecisions (
  decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  match_id INT,
  rule_id INT,
  disciplinary_action VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (match_id) REFERENCES Matches(match_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (rule_id) REFERENCES MatchRules(rule_id)
)

CREATE TABLE matches (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    referee_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (referee_id) REFERENCES referees (id)
);

CREATE TABLE disciplinary_decisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_id INT,
    rule_id INT,
    decision_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (match_id) REFERENCES matches (match_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (rule_id) REFERENCES match_rules (rule_id)
);
